relnotes.name: MAKEKEYS

defect.title: Some security pc-tools do not display the Open SSL copyright notice

relnotes.defect: Security pc tools displays openssl copyright notice.
Makekeys takes cares of password length and key generation without password.
relnotes.preq: TOOLS2 macro is added with TOOLS.
Changed according to filename policy to support the building of Symbian OS on both Windows and Linux.
